title: Could be better
body: Readers should note that most of the reviews of this book refer to older editions which are -- due to the rapid evolution of javascript -- completely different books.

title: Provides a deep dive
body: JavaScript: The Definitive Guide is not just a complete reference of the language, like O'Reilly's other 'thick books,' but also provides a deep dive into JavaScript development.

title: Must have
body: Pro React is the book I wish I had when I first started learning React/JS. I came from a background in Rails and entering the JS Community was super overwhelming. This book would have definitely put my mind at ease.
